DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if training visual attention improves balance and mobility, and reduces falls in older adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Visual Attention Training to Improve Balance and Mobility
DOC.detailed_description: Visual training in visual attention is compared with activity as usual.
DOC.criteria: Visual acuity 6/12 or better able to speak English No known dementia not dependent on a walker or cane
